image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
image.name: B001294_001

profileText: A Representative from Iowa; born in Dubuque, Dubuque County, Iowa, April 26, 1955; graduated from Dubuque Senior High School, Dubuque, Iowa, 1973; B.A., Loras College, Dubuque, Iowa, 1977; M.B.A., University of Dubuque, Dubuque, Iowa, 1989; business executive; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress in 2012; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-January 3, 2019); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress in 2018.

asset.name: B001294_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
